name: Capitain Parrothead!
description:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Theihe803

Discord: https://discord.gg/8s4thNx

You play as a seven year old kid who strives to take over an airship; but to do this you must insult all other kids to establish dominance! 

Created over a 78 hour gamejam period and originally published on: 2017/10/27

 #platformer #rpg 
 #adventure
